name: Yaoi Fetch-Quest
description:
Click all over the place to move, talk to characters, pick items up, and bring them to people. Can you get all the boys to love you ?

Yaoi Fetch-Quest was done for the Yaoi Game Jam and the Random Generation Game Jam by Popi and myself.

Features :

  • Boy-boy love !
  • Fully randomised character generation !
  • Random names !
  • Random quests !
  • Random seasons !
  • French and English versions !
  • Ducks !

All musics used are free of use. Source : http://www.purple-planet.com & https://www.youtube.com/audiolibrary/music
